00206     {
00207 public:

00209             min_angle[0] = min_angle[1] = max_angle[0] = max_angle[1] = resolution[0] = resolution[1] = 0;

00332     {

00400     virtual bool Init(const std::string&) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00401         RAVELOG_WARN("SensorBase::Init has been deprecated\n"); return Configure(CC_PowerOn)>0;
00402     }
00403     virtual void Reset(int) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00404         RAVELOG_WARN("SensorBase::Reset has been deprecated\n"); Configure(CC_PowerOff);
00405     }
